response.overview: CGI 3D Animated Short Film: Gracey Manor Horror Animated Short Film by Chris Gallagher. Featured on CGMeetup Gallery https://cgmeetup.com/project/gracey-m...  Gracey Manor is an animated dark, suspenseful tale of a haunted house.  Written, Directed and Edited by Chris Gallagher https://cgmeetup.com/chrisgallagher Music by Michael Picher Arrangement based on "Grim Grinning Ghosts" by Buddy Baker michaelpichermusic.com Cast: Ava Baker, Voice Talent Protagonist - avajanebaker1@gmail.com Kirsten Hintner, Voice Talent Antagonist - kirstenhintner.co.uk/ Sound Design/Sound Editing - Chris Gallagher
response.title: Gracey Manor

results.name: CGI Animated Horror Short Film: "Gracey Manor" by Chris Gallagher | CGMeetup
